response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $800,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure that such a valuable asset finds the right hands, and I trust that you would be the perfect owner. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
